thread.title: FM Arun Jaitley injured while boarding chopper in Haridwar
thread.title_full: FM Arun Jaitley injured while boarding chopper in Haridwar

author: FE Online
title: FM Arun Jaitley injured while boarding chopper in Haridwar
text:
FM Arun Jaitley injured while boarding chopper in Haridwar FM Arun Jaitley injured while boarding chopper in Haridwar Jaitley had gone to Haridwar to attend a Yoga Camp organised by Baba Ramdev run Patanjali. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: March 12, 2017 5:01 PM Finance Minister Arun Jaitley has been injured while boarding a chopper in Haridwar, Times Now reported. (ANI) 
Finance Minister Arun Jaitley has been injured while boarding a chopper in Haridwar, Times Now reported. Jaitley had gone to Haridwar to attend a Yoga Camp organised by Baba Ramdev run Patanjali. Meanwhile, CNN-News 18 reported that Jaitley fainted after slipping near the helipad. 
Further inputs awaited
